parsed_sentence.subject: Written procedures
parsed_sentence.modifier: for cleaning of equipment and its subsequent release for use in the manufacture of intermediates and APIs

parsed_sentence.subject: These procedures
parsed_sentence.condition: Cleaning procedures should contain sufficient details to enable operators to clean each type of equipment in a reproducible and effective manner

parsed_sentence.subject: A complete description of the methods and materials
parsed_sentence.modifier: description of the methods and materials , including dilution of cleaning agents used to clean equipment
for for the removal or obliteration of previous batch identification
for for the removal or obliteration of previous batch identification

parsed_sentence.subject: that
parsed_sentence.modifier: between the completion of processing and equipment cleaning

parsed_sentence.subject: Equipment and utensils
parsed_sentence.modifier: where appropriate , sanitized or sterilized to prevent contamination or carry-over

parsed_sentence.subject: It
parsed_sentence.condition: Starting materials should only be purchased from approved suppliers named in the relevant specification , and where possible , directly from the producer

parsed_sentence.action: Only starting materials which have been released by the Quality Control Department and which are within their shelf life should be used
